TimedRDMSimulator 1.0.0 API

Packages
Package
Description
org.lrdm
Package containing the domain classes of the simulator (e.g., Mirror and Link).
org.lrdm.effectors
Package containing the Effector to add Adaptation Action to the simulation.
org.lrdm.examples
Package containing example usages of the framework.
org.lrdm.probes
Package containing the probes offered by the framework to observe its execution.
org.lrdm.topologies
Package containing topology strategies of the simulator.
org.lrdm.util
Package for utility classes.
